about.paragraph: Hello! I'm Michael, an full stack web developer focused on building responsive and user-friendly apps with nextjs and other tools. My recent work involves AI-powered websites and web applications . I'm passionate about creating innovative solutions that make a positive impact on people's lives.

projects.description: A simple to do website that allows users to add, delete, and update tasks.
